run_id.description: ID of the run under which to log the param. Must be provided.

run_uuid.description:
[Deprecated, use run_id instead] ID of the run under which to log the param. This field will
be removed in a future MLflow version.

key.description: Name of the param. Maximum size is 255 bytes.

value.description: String value of the param being logged. Maximum size is 500 bytes.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Logs a param used for a run. A param is a key-value pair (string key, string value). Examples include hyperparameters used for ML model training and constant dates and values used in an ETL pipeline. A param can be logged only once for a run.
